summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VRH Buildcon construction company website. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly. Black and gold theme implemented beautifully with Playfair Display fonts.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, stats, services preview, featured projects, testimonials, CTA
Navigation works perfectly - all menu links navigate correctly (Home, About, Services, Projects, Contact)
Contact form submits successfully to /api/contact with success message
Quote form submits successfully to /api/quote with success message
Projects page filtering functionality works (All, Building, Interior, Electrical, Painting filters)
Footer displays correctly with contact info and social links
Professional black and gold design theme throughout
Responsive design and proper typography (Playfair Display + Manrope fonts)

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All pages, navigation, forms, and filtering working)
